game.name: Train Simulator: Buchan Line: Aberdeen - Peterhead
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ‘And always and at every point, Clatter on the causies.’ Scottish poet George Bruce said this of Aberdeen in his poem about the city, and now you can drive and explore this fascinating part of Scotland, thanks to developers Suburban Glasgow Ltd.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ‘And always and at every point, Clatter on the causies.’ Scottish poet George Bruce said this of Aberdeen in his poem about the city, and now you can drive and explore this fascinating part of Scotland, thanks to developers Suburban Glasgow Ltd.
